sources.title: 1942 Die Heimliche Gräfin ( Wolf Albach Retty, Oscar Sima, Paul Hörbiger, Richard Romanowsky)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1942. Die heimliche Gräfin.  U.a mit Paul Hörbiger und Wolf Albach Retty

metadata.Plot: A comedy of confusion in aristocratic Vienna at the turn of the 19th into the 20th Century: The young Bohemian Countess Antschi Dorival trades places with her friend Martina, because she wants to become an actress and applies as s...
metadata.Writer: Hugo Maria Kritz, Géza von Cziffra
metadata.Actors: Marte Harell, Wolf Albach-Retty, Elfriede Datzig
